summary: The diff implements automatic owner assignment on first authenticated user access, removes the 'Initialize as Owner' button, and adds a migration module to handle state changes. All three requirements (REQ-1, REQ-2, REQ-3) appear to be addressed through the autoInitializeIfNeeded() function and removal of manual initialization UI.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module added (backend/migration.mo) to handle state schema changes
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not mention adding migration functionality or changing the backend state schema. The migration removes ownerEmail and ownerPrincipal fields that were not part of the requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Addition of default categories initialization logic
hallucinated_features.reason: The addDefaultCategories() function and its invocation during store initialization was not requested in the BuildRequest. Adding product categories is outside the scope of fixing owner access.

hallucinated_features.description: Custom action ReactNode prop added to AccessDeniedScreen
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest specifies either making the button work or removing it entirely, but does not request adding a customAction prop for extensibility beyond this specific fix.
